祭政一致: (さいせいいっち) - (yoji) unity of church and state; theocracy
祭政分離: (さいせいぶんり) - (yoji) separation of church and state; separation of religious ritual and government administration
祭文: (さいもん) - address to the gods; type of song which spread from mountain hermits to the laity during the Kamakura era
祭日: (さいじつ) - national holiday; festival day
祭服: (さいふく) - vestments worn by priests and attendants (Shinto, Christian, etc.)
祭祀料: (さいしりょう) - donation made at a ritual
禀議: (ひんぎ) - reaching a decision by using a circular letter; reaching a decision via a document circulated to all employees
禀議書: (りんぎしょ) - draft plan circulated to obtain permission (draught)
禁: (kin) - prohibition , ban (por exemplo, sobre fumar), prohibition
禁じ手: (きんじて) - forbidden move (sumo, shogi, go, etc.); prohibited move; foul
禁じ箸: (きんじばし) - things prohibited by chopstick etiquette
禁ずる: (きんずる) - to forbid; to suppress
禁め: (いさめ) - remonstrance; remonstration; admonition; protest; reproof; expostulation; advice; counsel
禁める: (いさめる) - to remonstrate; to warn not to do something
禁を犯す: (きんをおかす) - to break the prohibition (law); to violate the ban
禁を解く: (きんをとく) - to lift (remove) a ban
禁中: (きんちゅう) - court; Imperial Palace or household
禁制原理: (きんせいげんり) - Pauli exclusion principle
禁制品: (きんせいひん) - contraband (goods); prohibited goods
禁呪: (きんじゅ) - charm; incantation; spell; magic formula
禁帯出: (きんたいしゅつ) - for reference only; in-library use only; not for loan
禁忌: (kinki) - tabu, dia, hora, direção, palavras, etc., que devem ser evitados; contraindicação
禁慾: (きんよく) - abstinence; self-control; celibacy; abnegation
禁手: (きんじて) - forbidden move (sumo, shogi, go, etc.); prohibited move; foul
禁断の木の実: (きんだんのこのみ) - forbidden fruit
禁断症状: (きんだんしょうじょう) - withdrawal symptoms; abstinence syndrome
禁書: (きんしょ) - prohibited book or literature
禁札: (きんさつ) - signboard bearing a prohibition notice
禁欲: (きんよく) - abstinence; self-control; celibacy; abnegation
禁欲主義教育: (きんよくしゅぎきょういく) - abstinence-only sex education
禁欲主義者: (きんよくしゅぎしゃ) - stoic; ascetic
禁欲生活: (きんよくせいかつ) - (yoji) an ascetic existence; (leading) a continent life; abstinence
禁止令: (きんしれい) - ban; prohibition; interdiction; injunction
禁止命令: (きんしめいれい) - interdict; prohibition order; writ of prohibition
禁止法: (きんしほう) - negative statute; law against something
禁漁区: (きんりょうく) - game preserve; wildlife sanctuary
禁漁期: (きんりょうき) - closed season for fishing or hunting
禁烟: (きんえん) - abstaining from smoking/quitting smoking; (on a sign) No Smoking!/Smoking Prohibited!
禁煙: (cara) - abstaining from smoking, quitting smoking; No Smoking!, Smoking Prohibited!
禁煙パイプ: (きんえんパイプ) - artificial cigarette used to avoid smoking
禁煙区域: (きんえんくいき) - no smoking area
禁煙外来: (きんえんがいらい) - smoking cessation clinic; smoking cessation outpatient services
禁煙補助薬: (きんえんほじょやく) - quit-smoking drug; smoking-cessation aid; stop-smoking medication
禁猟区: (きんりょうく) - game preserve; wildlife sanctuary
禁猟期: (きんりょうき) - closed season for fishing or hunting
禁色: (きんじき) - restrictions on the use of colors by ranks of Heian era courtiers
